The game itself is a pretty good JRPG and pretty innovative in certain ways but this iOS port does it a disservice. Thereâ€™s a bug that causes any FMV movie sequence to black screen and either crash or skip the scene with no way of telling. Meaning, you canâ€™t play either the beginning or ending movies and significant portions of the story are lost to you unless you YouTube it. Square Enix donâ€™t seem to be in a hurry to fix it so unfortunately this port should be avoided. Your best bets are the original DS game or the Switch rerelease.
